payload.question: What is Clickeen?
payload.answer: Embeddable widgets with conversions built in.

payload.question: Is there a free plan?
payload.answer: Yes, one active widget with core features.

payload.question: How do I install a widget?
payload.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it before </body> on your site.

html: <bob-panel id='content'>
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='showTitle' label='Show title' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='title' path='title' label='FAQ title' hint='Frequently Asked Questions' value='{{title}}' show-if="showTitle == 'true'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='search.enabled' label='Show search bar' />

<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='search.placeholder' path='search.placeholder' label='Search placeholder' hint='Search...' value='{{search.placeholder}}' show-if="search.enabled == 'true'" />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Stage/Pod layout' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.widthMode' label='Pod width' placeholder='Choose width' value='{{pod.widthMode}}' options='[{"label":"Wrap pod to widget","value":"wrap"},{"label":"Full width","value":"full"},{"label":"Fixed width","value":"fixed"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.contentWidth' label='Width in pixels' show-if="pod.widthMode == 'fixed'" />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='stage.alignment' label='Pod alignment' placeholder='Choose alignment' value='{{stage.alignment}}' options='[{"label":"Center","value":"center"},{"label":"Align left","value":"left"},{"label":"Align right","value":"right"},{"label":"Align top","value":"top"},{"label":"Align bottom","value":"bottom"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.radiusLinked' label='Link pod corners' value='{{pod.radiusLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radius' label='Corner radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radius}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'true' || pod.radiusLinked == '' || pod.radiusLinked == undefined" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusTL' label='Pod top-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusTL}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusTR' label='Pod top-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusTR}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusBR' label='Pod bottom-right radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusBR}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='pod.radiusBL' label='Pod bottom-left radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{pod.radiusBL}}' show-if="pod.radiusLinked == 'false'" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='pod.paddingLinked' label='Link pod padding' value='{{pod.paddingLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.padding' label='Pod padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'true' || pod.paddingLinked == '' || pod.paddingLinked == undefined" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingTop' label='Pod top padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingRight' label='Pod right padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingBottom' label='Pod bottom padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='pod.paddingLeft' label='Pod left padding (px)' show-if="pod.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='toggle' size='md' path='stage.paddingLinked' label='Link stage padding' value='{{stage.paddingLinked}}' default='false' />

<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.padding' label='Stage padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'true' || stage.paddingLinked == '' || stage.paddingLinked == undefined" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingTop' label='Stage top padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingRight' label='Stage right padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingBottom' label='Stage bottom padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
<tooldrawer-field-podstagelayout type='textfield' size='md' path='stage.paddingLeft' label='Stage left padding (px)' show-if="stage.paddingLinked == 'false'" />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Widget appearance' />
<tooldrawer-eyebrow text='Stage/Pod layout appearance' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='stage.background' label='Background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='pod.background' label='Widget background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='behavior'>
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandFirst' label='Open first question by default' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandAll' label='Expand all questions' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.multiOpen' label='Allow multiple open' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.shuffle' label='Shuffle question order' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.displayVideos' label='Display videos' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.displayImages' label='Display images' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='advanced'>
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' databinding='customCss' path='customCss' label='Custom CSS' hint='/* Custom CSS */' value='{{customCss}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textedit' size='md' databinding='behavior.customJs' path='behavior.customJs' label='Custom JS' placeholder='// Custom JS (state available as "state")' />
</bob-panel>
